alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM MST... At 321 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starlight Pines, or 29 miles north of Payson, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Soldiers Annex Lake, Blue Ridge Reservoir, Tremaine Lake, Elks Group CG, Starlight Pines, Soldiers Lake, Blue Ridge Campground, Long Lake, and Rock Crossing Campground. This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 295 and 311. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
